title: Authors and Citation
text: Dray M (2022). quartostamp: RStudio Addin Insert Quarto Helpers. R package version 0.0.0.9001.
code: @Manual{,   title = {quartostamp: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers},   author = {Matt Dray},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9001}, }

what: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
title: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
text: R package containing RStudio Addin insert pre-written divs classes Quarto documents. See package website full list available functions Quarto website full documentation ‘quartostamp’? physically stamp pre-prepared type literal quarto document; can digitally stamp pre-written elements qmd file.

title: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
text: install package GitHub, run following restart RStudio: use: Put cursor Quarto file ’d like insert element Click ‘RStudio Addins’ dropdown top RStudio IDE Scroll/search ‘QUARTOSTAMP’ click function want Use help files learn function. start stamp_ can search like ?stamp_notes. can also create custom RStudio keyboard shortcuts functions: Go ‘Tools’ ‘Modify Keyboard Shortcuts…’ Search {quartostamp} function want shortcut Click ‘Shortcut’ column type key combination want use Click ‘Apply’

title: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers
text:
packages can used alongside {quartostamp} writing document: {remedy} package contains RStudio Addin large number R Markdown helpers, e.g. ‘H2’ add leading hashmarks (##) signify level-two header {htmltools} package functions insert HTML tags, e.g. tags$h2() insert

level-two header

what: quartostamp: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers — quartostamp-package
title: quartostamp: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers — quartostamp-package
text: RStudio Addin insert ('stamp') pre-written classes divs Quarto documents. URL: https://matt-dray.github.io/quartostamp/, https://github.com/matt-dray/quartostamp

title: quartostamp: RStudio Addin to Insert Quarto Helpers — quartostamp-package
Insert Aside — stamp_aside
text: Insert div creates 'aside' Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert 'Caution' Callout Block — stamp_callout_caution
text: Insert callout-block div type 'caution', orange accent traffic-cone icon.

title: Insert 'Caution' Callout Block — stamp_callout_caution
code: :::{.callout-caution collapse=false appearance='default' icon=true} ## Optional caption (caution) - Hide callout body with 'collapse=true' - Remove 'collapse' to prevent expandability - Set appearance to 'default', 'simple' or 'minimal' - Remove icon with 'icon=false' :::

title: Insert 'Important' Callout Block — stamp_callout_important
text: Insert callout-block div type 'important', red accent exclamation-point icon.

title: Insert 'Important' Callout Block — stamp_callout_important
code: :::{.callout-important collapse=false appearance='default' icon=true} ## Optional caption (important) - Hide callout body with 'collapse=true' - Remove 'collapse' to prevent expandability - Set appearance to 'default', 'simple' or 'minimal' - Remove icon with 'icon=false' :::

title: Insert 'Note' Callout Block — stamp_callout_note
text: Insert callout-block div type 'note', blue accent letter '' icon.

title: Insert 'Note' Callout Block — stamp_callout_note
code: :::{.callout-note collapse=false appearance='default' icon=true} ## Optional caption (note) - Hide callout body with 'collapse=true' - Remove 'collapse' to prevent expandability - Set appearance to 'default', 'simple' or 'minimal' - Remove icon with 'icon=false' :::

title: Insert 'Tip' Callout Block — stamp_callout_tip
text: Insert callout-block div type 'tip', green accent lightbulb icon.

title: Insert 'Tip' Callout Block — stamp_callout_tip
code: :::{.callout-tip collapse=false appearance='default' icon=true} ## Optional caption (tip) - Hide callout body with 'collapse=true' - Remove 'collapse' to prevent expandability - Set appearance to 'default', 'simple' or 'minimal' - Remove icon with 'icon=false' :::

title: Insert 'Warning' Callout Block — stamp_callout_warning
text: Insert callout-block div type 'warning', yellow accent warning-triangle icon.

title: Insert 'Warning' Callout Block — stamp_callout_warning
code: :::{.callout-warning collapse=false appearance='default' icon=true} ## Optional caption (warning) - Hide callout body with 'collapse=true' - Remove 'collapse' to prevent expandability - Set appearance to 'default', 'simple' or 'minimal' - Remove icon with 'icon=false' :::

title: Insert Column Layout — stamp_columns
text: Insert div horizontal two-column layout percentage widths Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Column Layout — stamp_columns
code: :::: {.columns}  ::: {.column width='40%'} Left column :::  ::: {.column width='60%'} Right column :::  ::::

title: Insert Slide Divider — stamp_divider
text: Insert slide divider Revealjs presentation (slides without titles).

title: Insert Custom Footer — stamp_footer
text: Insert custom footer div Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Incremental List — stamp_incremental
text: Insert list-containing div Revealjs presentation slide revealed incrementally.

title: Insert Incremental List — stamp_incremental
code: ::: {.incremental} - List element A - List element B :::

title: Insert Non-Incremental List — stamp_nonincremental
text: Insert list-containing div Revealjs presentation slide revealed incrementally  (overrides global incremental reveal).

title: Insert Non-Incremental List — stamp_nonincremental
code: ::: {.nonincremental} - List element A - List element B :::

title: Insert Speaker Notes — stamp_notes
text: Insert speaker notes div Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Speaker Notes — stamp_notes
code: ::: {.notes} Speaker notes (press 's' when presenting to switch to speaker mode). :::

title: Insert Pause — stamp_pause
text: Insert pause marker Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Scrollable Content — stamp_scrollable
text: Insert class allows content scrolled slide small hold (place line slide title).

title: Insert Smaller Font — stamp_smaller
text: Insert class makes font smaller Revealjs presentation slide (place line slide title).

title: Insert Tabset — stamp_tabset
text: Insert panel tabset div Revealjs presentation slide.

title: Insert Tabset — stamp_tabset
code: ::: {.panel-tabset}  ### Tab A  Content for Tab A  ### Tab B  Content for Tab B  :::

title: quartostamp 0.0.0.9001
text: Added callout blocks stamp_callout_*() (#1, suggested @IndrajeetPatil). Added sections reference page package website. Updated wording documentation throughout. Added ‘details’ ‘references’ function documentation.

title: quartostamp 0.0.0.9000
text: Set package license, news, readme. Added RStudio Addins infrastructure (inst/rstudio/addins.dcf). Added first stamp_() functions.
